# isSearchableByDefault | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Core Spotlight ](/documentation/corespotlight)

- [ CSCustomAttributeKey ](/documentation/corespotlight/cscustomattributekey)

-  isSearchableByDefault 

Instance Property# isSearchableByDefault

A Boolean value that indicates if the custom attribute should be searchable by default.iOS 9.0+iPadOS 9.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.11+visionOS 1.0+

```
var isSearchableByDefault: Bool { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/CoreSpotlight/CSCustomAttributeKey/isSearchableByDefault#Discussion)

The default value of this property is `false`.

## [See Also](/documentation/CoreSpotlight/CSCustomAttributeKey/isSearchableByDefault#see-also)

### [Getting the attribute details](/documentation/CoreSpotlight/CSCustomAttributeKey/isSearchableByDefault#Getting-the-attribute-details)

[`var keyName: String`](/documentation/corespotlight/cscustomattributekey/keyname)The name of the custom attribute key.[`var isMultiValued: Bool`](/documentation/corespotlight/cscustomattributekey/ismultivalued)A Boolean value that indicates if the custom attribute is likely to have multiple values, such as arrays, associated with it.[`var isSearchable: Bool`](/documentation/corespotlight/cscustomattributekey/issearchable)A Boolean value that indicates if the custom attribute can be specified as a search term.[`var isUnique: Bool`](/documentation/corespotlight/cscustomattributekey/isunique)A Boolean value that indicates if duplicate custom attribute values should be treated as the same value to save storage space.
